casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Anthony Lamont BOULWARE No. 321P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017 Ms. Kimberly P. Hoppin, Attorney at Law, Mr. Anthony Lamont Boulware, for Boulware, Anthony Lamont Mr. Daniel Snipes Johnson, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mr. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th of September 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
